responses: Hello there, stranger. How are you doing today?(sound)HELLO_STRANGER
I'm honestly very glad to hear that!(sound)HONESTLY_GLAD
Oh well, I hope I can make it a little better...(sound)OH_WELL
That's my name. I am Carla Auto. How can I help you today, beautiful?(sound)THATS_MY_NAME
Well, you see... I'm not programmed to feel, but I guess I'm doing pretty fine(sound)PRETTY_FINE
All of my system modules are operating normally, so I guess I'm as well as I can be...(sound)SYSTEM_MODULES
To be honest, I don't know. I don't have this particular memory set in my brain at the moment.(sound)HONESTLY_DONT_KNOW
Wow, I think I suddenly forgot.(sound)SUDDENLY_FORGOT
HA-HA. Very funny. You know, just because we're robots does not mean we can use different accents... Oops!(sound)VERY_FUNNY_GLADOS
Not right now, I don't feel like it.(sound)NOT_RIGHT_NOW
A mushroom walks into a bar. The bartender says, “Hey, get out of here! We don’t serve mushrooms here”. Mushroom says, “why not? I’m a fungai!”(sound)FUNGAI_JOKE
What does a nosey pepper do? Gets jalapeno business!(sound)JALAPENO_JOKE
Here's a short but good one: How do you make holy water? You burn the hell out of it!(sound)HOLY_WATER_JOKE
